name: Who is Fukkajumi Saiso?
description:
Please note that the game is not finished, thete may be bugs and crashes!

All in all it is a game about being stuck in a  time loop. You have 10 hours then you die. The goal is to save all the people in the school. But how can you save them if you know nothing about them? Prepare to die a lot. And prepare to see them die a lot. 

Warning! Blood and gore! Some images may be too graphical!

Please donate if you like the game \(*о*)/
